name: New Year's Skate Party at Colonel Samuel Smith Park

location.name: Colonel Samuel Smith Park Skating Trail

description:
Start 2026 with fresh air and great vibes at the Colonel Samuel Smith Park skating trail. Join Mayor Olivia Chow and members of council at this lively event filled with music and cheer as you skate at this beautiful waterfront setting. Grab your skates — or rent a pair for free — and make this celebration one to remember with your friends and loved ones. 

Free skate rentals and hot chocolate will be available while supplies last.

name: New Year's Skate Party at McCowan District Park
description:
Kick off 2026 with a fun skate at McCowan District Park — the perfect spot to get outside and enjoy some great music. Lace up, take in the crisp winter air and glide along the trail with friends and family. Warm up with hot drinks, enjoy other winter activities and celebrate the first weekend of the year in style. Hosted by Mayor Olivia Chow and members of council.

Free skate rentals and hot chocolate will be available while supplies last.

name: New Year's Skate Party at North Toronto Memorial Community Centre

location.name: North Toronto Memorial Community Centre Ice Rink

description:
Join Mayor Olivia Chow and members of council for a fantastic start to the year at the North Toronto Memorial Community Centre ice rink. Enjoy upbeat music, a friendly atmosphere and warm beverages as you celebrate the first Sunday of the new year. Bring your family and friends — and get ready for a fun day on the ice.

Free skate rentals and hot chocolate will be available while supplies last.

name: New Year's Skate Party at Nathan Phillips Square
description:
Glide into 2026 and join Mayor Olivia Chow and members of council at Toronto's iconic Nathan Phillips Square. With its stunning backdrop and large rink, it's the ultimate place to skate into the new year. Enjoy an unforgettable afternoon of fun with music, hot drinks and a festive atmosphere. Get ready for good vibes, great company and plenty of action on and off the ice. 

Free skate rentals and hot chocolate will be available while supplies last.
